## Extensions interface

Extensions Service interface

Signature:

```typescript
export interface Extensions extends Service
```

Extends: [Service](/api/bud-framework/service)

## Properties

| Property                                     | Type                                                                | Description                             |
| -------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------- |
| [queue](/api/bud-framework/extensions/queue) | Array&lt;CompilerPlugin &#124; [Module](//bud-framework/module)&gt; | Extensions to be processed before build |

## Methods

| Method                                                                   | Description                                 |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------- |
| [add(extension)](/api/bud-framework/extensions/add)                      | Add an extension                            |
| [bootExtensions()](/api/bud-framework/extensions/bootextensions)         | Boot event for all extensions               |
| [enqueue(extension)](/api/bud-framework/extensions/enqueue)              |                                             |
| [make()](/api/bud-framework/extensions/make)                             | Get instances to be included in compilation |
| [processQueue()](/api/bud-framework/extensions/processqueue)             |                                             |
| [registerExtensions()](/api/bud-framework/extensions/registerextensions) | Register event for all extensions           |
